import React, {useState} from 'react' import List from './List' const AddList = ({colors}) =>{ const [popUp , showPopUp] = useState(false ) return
showPopUp(!popUp)} items= {[ { className: 'add-list__button', icon: , name:'Add list' } ]}isRemovable={false}/> {popUp &&
}
} export default AddList;
